items.question: What types of projects do you work on?
items.answer: I develop full-stack web applications, APIs, showcase websites and dashboards.

items.question: What are your turnaround times?
items.answer: Turnaround times vary depending on the complexity of the project. A showcase website generally takes 2-4 weeks, a complex web application 2-3 months.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance?
items.answer: Yes, I offer maintenance contracts to ensure that your applications run smoothly and are kept up to date.

items.question: How does a project work?
items.answer: Each project begins with a discovery phase, followed by design, development, testing, and deployment.
